problem.markdown:
>>1)What is the resolution of a 4-bit ADC if range is 0-10 volt.<< (x) 0.625 ( ) 0.652 ( ) 0.620 ( ) 0.700
>>2) The fastest ADC is<< ( ) Dual type (x) Flash type ( ) Successive approximation type ( ) Sigma-delta type
>>3) ASK, PSK, FSK, QAM are examples of .................. conversion.<< ( ) digital-to-digital (x) digital-to-analog ( ) analog-to-analog ( ) analog-to-digital
>>4)AM and FM are example of................ conversion.<< ( ) digital-to-digital ( ) digital-to-analog (x) analog-to-analog ( ) analog-to-digital
>>5) Analog-to-analog conversion is needed if the available bandwidth is .................<< ( ) low-pass (x) band-pass ( ) either(a)or(b) ( ) neither(a)or(b)
